Posts.Title: Upcoming School Event
Posts.Body: Hey everyone! Don't forget about the upcoming school event this Friday. We'll have food, games, and a live band. See you there!

Posts.Title: Study Group for Math Exam
Posts.Body: Looking for study partners for the upcoming math exam. Let's help each other ace this! DM me if you're interested.

Posts.Title: Book Recommendations
Posts.Body: I'm on the hunt for some good books to read during the break. Any recommendations? I love sci-fi and fantasy genres.

Posts.Title: Volunteer Opportunity
Posts.Body: There's a volunteer opportunity at the local animal shelter this weekend. If you love animals and want to help out, let's go together!

Posts.Title: Homework Help Request
Posts.Body: Struggling with my history homework. Anyone here familiar with World War II? I could use some guidance.

Posts.Title: Healthy Snack Ideas
Posts.Body: Trying to eat healthier snacks. What are your favorite healthy snack ideas that are easy to make?

Posts.Title: New Club Announcement
Posts.Body: Exciting news! We're starting a photography club at school. Interested in photography? Join us for our first meeting next week

Posts.Title: Local Community Cleanup
Posts.Body: Join us this Saturday for a community cleanup event. Let's make our neighborhood cleaner and greener. Bring your friends!

Posts.Title: Looking for a Carpool Buddy
Posts.Body: I live near campus and am looking for a carpool buddy to share rides with. Let's save money and reduce our carbon footprint!

Posts.Title: Movie Night Suggestions
Posts.Body: Planning a movie night with friends. Any movie recommendations that are suitable for a mixed group? Comedy or action preferred.
